ygData.subject: Re: DOT Spells question
ygData.msgSnippet: you don t :) after a while you ll just get a feel for timing, I find I can time engulfing darkness down to within a few seconds...unfortunately when I time it
ygData.messageBody:
you don't :) after a while you'll just get a feel for timing, I find I can
time engulfing darkness down to within a few seconds...unfortunately when I
time it on the wrong side and it wears off... things usually go wrong.

----- Original Message -----
From: Heath Barker <Merxion@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 1:37 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] DOT Spells question
